## Description {#details}

Declares methods and data structures for code layout algorithms.

<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Find a layout of nodes (basic blocks) of a given CFG optimizing jump</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// locality and thus processor I-cache utilization. This is achieved via</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// increasing the number of fall-through jumps and co-locating frequently</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// executed nodes together.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The nodes are assumed to be indexed by integers from &#91;0, |V|) so that the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// current order is the identity permutation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p NodeSizes: The sizes of the nodes (in bytes).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p NodeCounts: The execution counts of the nodes in the profile.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p EdgeCounts: The execution counts of every edge (jump) in the profile. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    map also defines the edges in CFG and should include 0-count edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\returns The best block order found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codelayout/#ab265fb35ca9607f01d99dae7a386ef77">computeExtTspLayout</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> NodeSizes,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> NodeCounts,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;EdgeCount&gt;</a> EdgeCounts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Estimate the &quot;quality&quot; of a given node order in CFG. The higher the score,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the better the order is. The score is designed to reflect the locality of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the given order, which is anti-correlated with the number of I-cache misses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in a typical execution of the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codelayout/#a70c3cab5f18ff0a00d4ad43ec3287021">calcExtTspScore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> Order, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> NodeSizes,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;EdgeCount&gt;</a> EdgeCounts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Estimate the &quot;quality&quot; of the current node order in CFG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codelayout/#a70c3cab5f18ff0a00d4ad43ec3287021">calcExtTspScore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> NodeSizes,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;EdgeCount&gt;</a> EdgeCounts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Algorithm-specific params for Cache-Directed Sort. The values are tuned for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the best performance of large-scale front-end bound binaries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codelayout/cdsortconfig"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codelayout/cdsortconfig">CDSortConfig</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The size of the cache.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codelayout/cdsortconfig/#ad5722362bbe8b820f7171a89b500180e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codelayout/cdsortconfig/#ad5722362bbe8b820f7171a89b500180e">CacheEntries</a> = 16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The size of a line in the cache.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codelayout/cdsortconfig/#a9b3e2b25b382491b92cc2ec6d066dae9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codelayout/cdsortconfig/#a9b3e2b25b382491b92cc2ec6d066dae9">CacheSize</a> = 2048;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The maximum size of a chain to create.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codelayout/cdsortconfig/#a7ca32aeb071c565b99935586655ac847"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codelayout/cdsortconfig/#a7ca32aeb071c565b99935586655ac847">MaxChainSize</a> = 128;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The power exponent for the distance-based locality.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codelayout/cdsortconfig/#ab8843f638794cf74c8044107ae618200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codelayout/cdsortconfig/#ab8843f638794cf74c8044107ae618200">DistancePower</a> = 0.25;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The scale factor for the frequency-based locality.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codelayout/cdsortconfig/#acf9844a48ea378fd1887b0a4146a7af3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codelayout/cdsortconfig/#acf9844a48ea378fd1887b0a4146a7af3">FrequencyScale</a> = 0.25;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Apply a Cache-Directed Sort for functions represented by a call graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The placement is done by optimizing the call locality by co-locating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// frequently executed functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p FuncSizes: The sizes of the nodes (in bytes).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p FuncCounts: The execution counts of the nodes in the profile.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p CallCounts: The execution counts of every edge (jump) in the profile. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    map also defines the edges in CFG and should include 0-count edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p CallOffsets: The offsets of the calls from their source nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\returns The best function order found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codelayout/#a40b559a61a165123bb62e26c941a223b">computeCacheDirectedLayout</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> FuncSizes, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> FuncCounts,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;EdgeCount&gt;</a> CallCounts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> CallOffsets);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"></CodeLine>
